title: i dont know my user name or email
body: guys i need help. For my smurf, i forgot my username but the problem is i forgot my email too so i need help riot help me and i have a lot of rp in it please help me asap. Is it possible to recover my username cause i knoow the password. pls halp

replies.body: Normally, the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide should be able to help you.  For your specifics issue, I suggest reaching out to us directly through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) since you aren't sure about your email.  We'll get back to you asap!
